name: Infinite Capital
overview: The key to the successful pursuit of debt and equity real estate capital is to navigate the ongoing credit market turbulence -avoiding pitfalls while taking advantage of upside volatility. Success means low-cost capital, long-term structures, and certainty of execution; failure means non-ex ecu tion/ wasted application fees and useless third party reports. Daily market conditions are changing in dramatic fashion; existing lenders are shutting down each week with new lenders entering the market just as fast; underwriting rules are tightening in many sectors, constricting loan proceeds and putting high leverage transactions at risk. Now more than ever you need an experienced mortgage banking firm with a broad market reach arranging your real estate finance* However, the features and benefits between different sources of capital vary widely. Despite the low cost capital available In the marketplace today, we believe the single most important factor in obtaining financing Is to also make sure that the product features are appropriate for our clients needs. It does not make sense to place clients into low-cost loan products if the loan terms aren’t appropriate for their needs.
